divs: Sighting DetailsSeveral teenage friends and I were sleeping outside in the backyard of where I lived at the time in Blackwell,OK.We saw three disc,light gold colored,objects flying from East to West very high in the night sky,the objects were flying in a vee formation and moving at a very high rate of speed.Movement of the objects is what caught our attention.Total time of our seeing the UFO's was about 1 minute.My feeling at the time was of surprise. We discussed the event among our selves and were to excited to sleep much that long ago summer night.I never saw UFO's before or after that sighting. All of us saw the same disc shaped,gold colored objects.
Summary: Three very fast saucers flying in triangle formation,East to West;High rate of speed.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Blackwell
This sighting has never been favorited.
